short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your miniature browser companion! Wols watch movies with you, listen to your music, and much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet the wols! (plural). An adorable species of miniature browser companions that will watch your movies, listen to your music, and study with you. Befriending a wol is easy: give it your love, and it will return the favor.

Man's (new) best friend can change colors and even be adorned with plenty of accessories to customize your wol-ful browsing experience. 

[NOTE FROM THE DEVELOPER:]
This project is still at an early stage and many more poses, animations, and accessories will be available in the future. Contact byteselk@gmail.com if you have any suggestions. Happy browsing!

[ANOTHER NOTE FROM THE DEVELOPER:]
They're not creepy, I promise.
